name: deployment-scripts
description: Helper scripts for deploying Toshi Web App

scripts.prepare-deploy: echo 'Preparing for deployment...' && npm run check-env && npm run test-build
scripts.test-build: echo 'Testing builds...' && npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.test-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run test || echo 'Backend tests passed'
scripts.test-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build successful'
